ministry.name: Overhead Ministry
ministry.overview: Our Mission: We are committed to setting an atmosphere that enhances the worship service experience through lighting and graphic presentation that seeks to glorify God. We lead the body of Christ in worship and throughout the service through media presentation and distribution of information in an artistic manner.

p.strong: Lighting Vision: The Lighting ministry desires to equip its servants through service, set at atmosphere that draws both the lost and the saved to a closer relationship to God.
Presnetation Vision: Equip the servant through fellowship and service. To be worship leaders, ministering to the body of Christ at Calvary Austin throughout the worship service.

long-description.p: The lighting ministry sets stage lights for worship services and special events, including plays, video productions, etc. and the presntation aspect is accomplished using computers, software and projection.
